resources.string: DISCLAIMER: This app gives only an approximate value for the BAC. Please be careful when you drink. The creators of this app do not condone underage drinking.
Select Sober Up! to estimate time needed to sober up. Select Pacer to pace your drinking.

The BUzztracker group comprises of Karanraj Chauhan, Rijish Ganguly, Rahul Jain, Anand Sanmukhani and Anirudh Sriram. 

We are a group of Sophomore and Junior students majoring in Computer Engineering and this app was the final project for our Introduction to Software Engineering class under the supervision of Professor Douglas Densmore.

Hope you enjoy using our App and 
hope you stay safe!
